text.name: Indicant's Trial
text.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal (1 + highest Reson.) allies with the least HP percentages for 15% of their max HP (max 3 allies)
[EndSkill] For 3 turns, lose 10 SP at Turn End
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] If this hits the main target, inflict (1 + (Wrath Reson. / 3)) [BirdCage] next turn on main target (max 2; rounded down)

text.name: Indicant's Trial
text.desc:
<style="highlight">[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. / 2) Atk Weight (max 3; rounded down)
[EndSkill] Heal (1 + highest Reson.) allies with the least HP percentage for <style="highlight">18% of their max HP (max 3 allies)
[EndSkill] For 3 turns, lose 10 SP at Turn End
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] If this hits the main target, inflict (1 + (Wrath Reson. / 3)) [BirdCage] next turn on main target (max <style="highlight">3; rounded down)

text.name: Indicant's Trial
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. / 2) Atk Weight (max 3; rounded down)
[EndSkill] Heal (1 + highest Reson.) allies with the least HP percentage for <style="highlight">20% of their max HP (max 3 allies)
[EndSkill] For 3 turns, lose 10 SP at Turn End
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] If this hits the main target, inflict (1 + (Wrath Reson. / 3)) [BirdCage] next turn on main target (max 3; rounded down)<style="highlight">

passiveList.name: Blazing Amusement
passiveList.desc:
When a target with 10+ [Combustion] Count is defeated, inflict the [Combustion] Count on target between all enemies and heal SP 8 on self (in Focused Encounters, between all Parts; 3 max per target, 2 times per turn)
- At max SP, heal 5 SP for 1 ally with the least SP instead

text.name: Indicant's Trial
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets Randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. / 2) Atk Weight (max 3; rounded down)
coinDescs: [UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] If this hits the main target, inflict (1 + Wrath Reson.) [BirdCage] on main target (max 3)
Deal +1% damage on main target for every [Combustion] Potency on main target (max 50%)
[EnemyKill] Apply 1 [CrimsonResultUp] and 1 [CrimsonDamageUp] to (1 + highest Reson.) allies with the least HP percentages (max 4 allies; once per Skill)
